name: npc-for-vortex
description: Allows Vortex extensions to expose npc endpoints.
author: Tobey

scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && extractInfo && pnpm webpack
scripts.bundle: pnpm build --devtool none && rimraf npc-vortex-extension.7z && 7z a -t7z npc-vortex-extension.7z ./dist/*
scripts.release: pnpm build --mode production --devtool none && rimraf npc-vortex-extension.7z && 7z a -t7z npc-vortex-extension.7z ./dist/*
